name: Santa's Death Squad
description:
The evil Greench have stolen Christmas and Santa is pissed.

Santa's little helper gnomes are not very good fighters, but they are armed with unwavering belief in Santa, the Christmas Spirit and jackets filled with high explosives.
They know they must sacrifice themselves in order to rescue Christmas and make all of the rich children in the world happy. 
Set forth, SANTA'S DEATH SQUAD!Controls:

WASD to move the Head Dwarf (with the little crown).
CLICK ANYWHERE to KAMIKAZE
Press M to MUTE MUSIC
